jobs_results.title: Android Developer
jobs_results.description:
Job Title: Senior Android Developer

Job Type: Full-Time

Our client is looking for a Senior Android Developer with strong expertise in Kotlin, Jetpack Compose, and a deep understanding of modern Android development practices. If you're passionate about crafting clean, scalable, and high-performing mobile applications, thrive in an agile environment, and enjoy collaborating with cross-functional Scrum teams.

Key Responsibilities:
â€¢ Design, develop, and maintain high-quality Android applications using Kotlin and Jetpack Compose.
â€¢ Work closely with product owners, designers, and backend engineers to deliver seamless user experiences.
â€¢ Implement and maintain robust, scalable, and efficient APIs and architectures, following Domain Driven Design principles.
â€¢ Collaborate in a cross-functional Scrum team, taking part in all phases of the software development life cycle.
â€¢ Ensure the application adheres to the best coding practices, SOLID principles, and architectural guidelines.
â€¢ Continuously refactor and improve the codebase for performance, security, and scalability.
â€¢ Stay up-to-date with the latest Android trends and technologies, proposing improvements to ensure the product stays current and competitive.

Please note to apply for this position you must be based around Athens area and willing to come into the office.

Required Skills & Experience:
â€¢ 5+ years of experience in Android development, with proven experience in Kotlin and Jetpack Compose.
â€¢ Solid experience in APIs integration and building architectures for scalable mobile applications.
â€¢ Strong understanding of Domain Driven Design (DDD) and other modern architectural patterns.
â€¢ Experience working in Scrum/Agile environments, with an emphasis on collaboration and continuous improvement.
â€¢ Familiarity with automated testing, CI/CD pipelines, and version control (Git).
â€¢ Excellent problem-solving skills and a proactive attitude towards optimizing performance and user experience.

jobs_results.title: Android Developer in  Athens
jobs_results.description:
ARE YOU READY to step up to the New and take your technology expertise to the next level?

Through unmatched industry experience, leading technologies from our ecosystem partners and startups, and the largest delivery network in the world, we provide a powerful range of capabilities that can be tailored to our clientâ€™s most complex business needs. With over 100 innovation hubs deployed around the world, we help clients continuously innovate at speed and at scale so they can outpace their peers. You will bring innovation, intelligence and industry experience together with the newest technologies to help clients innovate at scale and transform their businesses.

Technology is one of four servicesâ€“the others are Strategy and Consulting, Interactive and Operations.

WORK YOUâ€™LL DO

As an Android Developer, you will be responsible for delivering large-scale, complex programs that marry processes with technology to help our clients achieve high performance by leveraging the most current Mobility trends.

Responsibilities:
â€¢ Documenting business requirements and re-engineering business and/or IT processes
â€¢ Performing application design activities (e.g., designing user interface, usability testing)
â€¢ Assisting in conducting gap analysis between business requirements and software
â€¢ Creating functional requirements as an input to application design
â€¢ Assisting with build, test, and deploy activities
â€¢ Proposing ideas for using digital and mobile technologies to address client issues and challenge

jobs_results.title: Senior Android Developer (E-Wallet Product, Fully Remote)
jobs_results.description:
â€¢ Do you have experience as an Android Developer and would like to contribute to the development of innovative mobile wallet applications in a fully remote, long-term contract role?
â€¢ Would you be interested in joining a fully remote team in Greece, contributing to a product that focuses on secure digital identities and mobile driving licenses?

ManpowerGroup Greece, on behalf of its client, an International Technology Services Provider, with focus at offering ISO-compliant Mobile Driving Licenses, Mobile IDs and overall, Wallet Apps, is looking for a Senior Android Developer to join their Product Team.

ğŸ“Œ Location: Greece

ğŸ“ Working Model: Fully Remote (you need to be based in Greece and holder of a valid EU Work Permit)

ğŸ–‹ï¸ You will be reporting to: CTO

What you will do:

As a Senior Android Developer for an innovative E-Wallet product, you will play a crucial role in the design and development of secure mobile wallet applications. Working remotely, you will collaborate with a dedicated team in Greece to enhance features that focus on secure digital identities and mobile driving licenses. Your expertise in Android development will contribute to creating cutting-edge solutions for ISO-compliant Mobile Driving Licenses, Mobile IDs, and comprehensive Wallet Apps.

Your main responsibilities will be:
â€¢ Designing and building advanced applications for the Android platform
â€¢ Collaborating with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features
â€¢ Mentoring junior developers, leading by example in terms of code quality and engineering best practices
â€¢ Conducting thorough unit and UI tests to identify malfunctions, ensuring robustness and reliability
â€¢ Staying up-to-date with new technology trends, applications, and protocols within the mobile landscape, especially regarding Android development
â€¢ Evaluating and implementing new technologies to maximize development efficiency
â€¢ Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field
â€¢ 6+ years of experience in Android development with strong knowledge of Kotlin.
â€¢ At least 1-2 years of experience with Android Jetpack (e.g., Navigation, WorkManager, Room, etc.)
â€¢ Proficiency in Android SDK, different versions of Android, and how to deal with different screen sizes
â€¢ Experience with RESTful APIs, JSON, and third-party libraries for integrating mobile applications
â€¢ Experience with Android UI design principles, patterns, and best practices
â€¢ Experience with cloud message APIs and usage of push notifications.
â€¢ Solid understanding of the full mobile development lifecycle development
â€¢ Expertise in implementing security frameworks and ensuring compliance with data encryption standards
â€¢ Strong written and verbal communication skills in English

Will be highly appreciated:
â€¢ Experience in problem analysis and delivering end-to-end (E2E) solutions.
â€¢ An attractive compensation package
â€¢ To be employed as Contractor (preferably for a long-term commitment) - or as an employee
â€¢ Home Office Allowance of â‚¬1,000
â€¢ A MacBook and work screen provided for your convenience
â€¢ A friendly and collaborative working environment
â€¢ Opportunities for professional development and career advancement

Recruitment Process:
â€¢ If youâ€™re interested in this role, feel free to apply directly. Our consultants will contact the candidates who meet the profileâ€™s requirements to arrange an interview.
â€¢ As for the next step, there will be 2 more interview round with the Hiring Manager

You can always check all our IT/Technology Roles here: IT Jobs | ManpowerGroup Greece - (manpowergreece.gr)

#Empoweringtalent #WebelieveinTalent #ManpowerGroupGreece

Benefits

jobs_results.title: Android native Developer
jobs_results.description:
Android native Developer â€“ Athens

We challenge and innovate to connect people, businesses, and communities across the world. Delighting our customers and earning their loyalty drive us, and we experiment, learn fast and get it done, together. With us, you can truly be yourself and belong, share inspiration, embrace new opportunities, thrive, and make a real difference.

We are seeking a highly skilled and motivated Android native Developer to join our team.

The Team

The Mobile Apps teamâ€™s purpose is to keep our systems and apps for mobile devices healthy and secure, enhance the codebase with tools, libraries and tweaks that improve performance and increase productivity, providing competitive advantages to the platform, and offer a unique experience to our customers.

Engineers design and implement new features in a fast-paced fintech environment. They also find solutions to streamline highly scalable and critical applications, affecting millions of users.

The Role

Software engineers in Mobile Apps are responsible for a multitude of projects and are expected to be able to work independently, assist their teammates and mentor junior developers. You will also be expected to collaborate across multiple workstreams and roles like architects, program management leads and engineering leads across the Technology Group.

Responsibilities
â€¢ Design, build, test, and maintain efficient, reusable, and reliable code;
â€¢ Be a team player. Offer your help, listen and seek to understand. Step up & take initiatives;
â€¢ Research innovative technologies to find new and efficient ways to solve day-to-day challenges.

Tech stack

We develop our libraries and applications using Android SDK native tools, written in Java/Kotlin and C/C++ for sensitive code parts for maximum security. We use GitHub for code versioning, and the Atlassian stack for tickets and documentation. We write extensive unit tests using Espresso and Mockito.

No worries if you are not familiar with our specific tech stack; we will pair you with a mentor to help you bridge the gaps!

Requirements
â€¢ Experience developing production-level mobile apps;
â€¢ In-depth knowledge of Java and/or Kotlin, Android Studio and Android SDK;
â€¢ Demonstrable experience with third-party libraries and APIs;
â€¢ Good understanding in web service architectures; JSON and RESTful APIs;
â€¢ Solid understanding of the full mobile development life cycle;
â€¢ Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills;
â€¢ The ability to perform in a team environment and be resilient;
â€¢ Passion about mobile platforms and translating code into user-friendly applications;
â€¢ Experience in payments technologies, EFTPOS systems and standards, EMV will be a strong plus.

What's in it for you:

Â· Competitive pay, remuneration package

Â· Private health insurance for you and your family

Â· Top of the Line tools and equipment

Â· Access to learning resources and trainings.

Â· A chance to grow within a stable, fast-moving European Fintech Company/Neobank

Â· Special employee offers and discounts.

jobs_results.title: Android Developer (AD 0924)
jobs_results.description:
At Skroutz, our mission is simple: we aim to amaze. From our humble beginnings back in 2005, we believe that happy customers equal happy merchants and itâ€™s our job to understand and anticipate their needs and offer them an unparalleled, doubt-free experience.

Our vision is clear: we aspire to become the Everyday App, the go-to destination where millions fulfill their online shopping needs. Whether you're looking for a new smartphone, restocking your pantry with essentials, seeking the perfect outfit for an upcoming event, or simply hunting for that collectible gaming console, Skroutz is your trusted partner for seamless shopping experiences.

And our ambitions extend far beyond Greece's borders. We're on a trajectory to become one of Europe's fastest-growing Marketplaces, with exciting expansions already underway in Cyprus and the Balkans. Our commitment to customer satisfaction remains paramount, guiding every decision we make.

To achieve our vision, we seek individuals who share our passion for e-commerce and technology. If you're driven by the desire to create extraordinary shopping moments for our users, as well as help sellers all around the world grow their businesses, then we want you on our team.

Join us at Skroutz and be part of a journey that's reshaping the way we shop online. Together, let's turn everyday moments into remarkable experiences.

Ready for the challenge?

#AimToAmaze

Our engineering values
â€¢ Know your Tech. Develop and master your craft, sharpen your tools. Be proud of your work.
â€¢ Release early & Iterate. Deliver prototypes and start gathering important feedback early on. Use that feedback to guide you. Don't be afraid to compromise, make sure to come back & tidy things up
â€¢ Be a team player. Offer your help, listen and seek to understand. Step up & take initiatives.
â€¢ Don't over anything. Don't over-engineer, over-analyze, over-regulate, you get it
â€¢ Enjoy your work. Celebrate success

Technologies we use

Our main stack is Ruby for the backend - using the Ruby on Rails framework - with Javascript (ES6) and React/Redux for the frontend. Our main storage is a MariaDB cluster. We heavily use Elasticsearch, Kafka, MongoDB, Redis and Memcached. We use Jenkins for our CI and various tools like Sentry, NewRelic and Grafana for monitoring. Generally we try to pick the best tool we know or we can find that serves our needs. You can read more about what we have worked on our Engineering blog.

How will you contribute to Skroutz vision

After some years of successfully launching and constantly improving our Android and iOS apps, currently used by hundreds of thousands of users, we are now ready to take them to the next level! Our vision is to make Skroutz a mobile-first company where apps will play a central role in revolutionizing the experience of buying online! If having â€œa billion products at your fingertipsâ€ sounds exciting and challenging to you, you may be just the kind of person weâ€™re looking for!

We are growing our mobile engineering team and are looking for Android Developers with...
â€¢ strong technical background
â€¢ â€œget-things-doneâ€ attitude
â€¢ self-motivation
â€¢ team spirit
â€¢ attention to details
â€¢ thirst for knowledge
â€¢ desire to make an impact

What you will be doing
â€¢ Work in an agile team with other mobile developers, API engineers and UI/UX designers to develop and maintain our Android app, building new features and shaping our product
â€¢ Track down and fix performance bottlenecks and bugs, improving the reliability of our Android app
â€¢ Employ A/B testing to measure the performance of different approaches to features and implementations, providing the best UX for our users
â€¢ Review and evaluate code from fellow team members, exchanging comments that make you and the author better engineers
â€¢ At least 2 (two) years of experience as an Android mobile developer
â€¢ Proven track record of building and shipping Android apps in the Google Play Store
â€¢ Deep knowledge of Java and Kotlin
â€¢ Good knowledge of the Android SDK (Components, Lifecycles, Layouts, Fragments, Animations, Drawables)
â€¢ Knowledge of OO design principles, software and Android design patterns
â€¢ Familiarity with modern Android architectures (MVP, MVVM)
â€¢ Expert knowledge of asynchronous programming
â€¢ Experience with developing highly-performant code and the ability to diagnose performance bottlenecks
â€¢ Fluency with web service architectures and technologies: JSON and RESTful APIs
â€¢ Passion for readable, maintainable and performant code
â€¢ Familiarity with common software engineering tools and practices (Git, Unit Testing, CI)
â€¢ Some familiarity with design/UX principles
â€¢ Intrigued by the product as much as by technology
â€¢ Proficiency in Greek: the role involves regular interactions with Greek-speaking stakeholders, and a strong command of the Greek language is essential to ensure effective communication

We will appreciate it if you have
â€¢ Projects youâ€™ve built/contributed to (e.g. Github account)
â€¢ Optimization of data usage over mobile networks
â€¢ Knowledge of Reactive/Functional programming
â€¢ Knowledge of SQLite
â€¢ Familiarity with agile methodologies and practices

What's it like to work at Skroutz?
â€¢ A great opportunity to contribute to the evolution of Skroutz towards becoming one of Europeâ€™s fastest growing Marketplaces
â€¢ Thrive in an environment that champions ambitious goals, empowers autonomy, fosters mentoring, and unlocks exciting opportunities for both personal and business growth
â€¢ Competitive full-time salary
â€¢ Ongoing training and development
â€¢ Access to books, online courses, and relevant resources
â€¢ Top of the Line tools and equipment
â€¢ Private Medical Plan
â€¢ Hybrid Working
â€¢ Free gym membership at Golden Gym in Athens, plus OAKA cross training & running courses, Padel and online yoga
â€¢ For all New Skroutz Fathers we offer 30 working days paternity leave (1,5 months in total)
â€¢ Monthly childcare allowance for all Skroutz Parents
â€¢ Free Skroutz Plus subscription

As part of our dedication to the diversity of our workforce, Skroutz is committed to Equal Employment Opportunity without regard to race, color, national origin, ethnicity, gender, disability, sexual orientation, or religion.

Disclaimer:

Skroutz collects and processes personal data in accordance with the EU General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR). We are bound to use the information provided within your job application for recruitment purposes only and not to share these with any unauthorized third parties. Please read our Recruitment Privacy Policy here.

jobs_results.title: Android Developer (AD 0924)
jobs_results.description:
At Skroutz, our mission is simple: we aim to amaze. From our humble beginnings back in 2005, we believe that happy customers equal happy merchants and it's our job to understand and anticipate their needs and offer them an unparalleled, doubt-free experience.

Our vision is clear: we aspire to become the Everyday App, the go-to destination where millions fulfill their online shopping needs. Whether you're looking for a new smartphone, restocking your pantry with essentials, seeking the perfect outfit for an upcoming event, or simply hunting for that collectible gaming console, Skroutz is your trusted partner for seamless shopping experiences.

And our ambitions extend far beyond Greece's borders. We're on a trajectory to become one of Europe's fastest-growing Marketplaces, with exciting expansions already underway in Cyprus and the Balkans. Our commitment to customer satisfaction remains paramount, guiding every decision we make.

To achieve our vision, we seek individuals who share our passion for e-commerce and technology. If you're driven by the desire to create extraordinary shopping moments for our users, as well as help sellers all around the world grow their businesses, then we want you on our team.

Join us at Skroutz and be part of a journey that's reshaping the way we shop online. Together, let's turn everyday moments into remarkable experiences.

Ready for the challenge?

#AimToAmaze

Our engineering values
â€¢ Know your Tech. Develop and master your craft, sharpen your tools. Be proud of your work
â€¢ Release early & Iterate. Deliver prototypes and start gathering important feedback early on. Use that feedback to guide you. Don't be afraid to compromise, make sure to come back & tidy things up
â€¢ Be a team player. Offer your help, listen and seek to understand. Step up & take initiatives
â€¢ Don't over anything. Don't over-engineer, over-analyze, over-regulate, you get it
â€¢ Enjoy your work. Celebrate success

Technologies we use

Our main stack is Ruby for the backend - using the Ruby on Rails framework - with Javascript (ES6) and React/Redux for the frontend. Our main storage is a MariaDB cluster. We heavily use Elasticsearch, Kafka, MongoDB, Redis and Memcached. We use Jenkins for our CI and various tools like Sentry, NewRelic and Grafana for monitoring. Generally we try to pick the best tool we know or we can find that serves our needs. You can read more about what we have worked on our Engineering blog.

How Will You Contribute To Skroutz Vision

After some years of successfully launching and constantly improving our Android and iOS apps, currently used by hundreds of thousands of users, we are now ready to take them to the next level! Our vision is to make Skroutz a mobile-first company where apps will play a central role in revolutionizing the experience of buying online! If having "a billion products at your fingertips" sounds exciting and challenging to you, you may be just the kind of person we're looking for!

We are growing our mobile engineering team and are looking for Android Developers with...
â€¢ strong technical background
â€¢ "get-things-done" attitude
â€¢ self-motivation
â€¢ team spirit
â€¢ attention to details
â€¢ thirst for knowledge
â€¢ desire to make an impact

What You Will Be Doing
â€¢ Work in an agile team with other mobile developers, API engineers and UI/UX designers to develop and maintain our Android app, building new features and shaping our product
â€¢ Track down and fix performance bottlenecks and bugs, improving the reliability of our Android app
â€¢ Employ A/B testing to measure the performance of different approaches to features and implementations, providing the best UX for our users
â€¢ Review and evaluate code from fellow team members, exchanging comments that make you and the author better engineers

Requirements
â€¢ At least 2 (two) years of experience as an Android mobile developer
â€¢ Proven track record of building and shipping Android apps in the Google Play Store
â€¢ Deep knowledge of Java and Kotlin
â€¢ Good knowledge of the Android SDK (Components, Lifecycles, Layouts, Fragments, Animations, Drawables)
â€¢ Knowledge of OO design principles, software and Android design patterns
â€¢ Familiarity with modern Android architectures (MVP, MVVM)
â€¢ Expert knowledge of asynchronous programming
â€¢ Experience with developing highly-performant code and the ability to diagnose performance bottlenecks
â€¢ Fluency with web service architectures and technologies: JSON and RESTful APIs
â€¢ Passion for readable, maintainable and performant code
â€¢ Familiarity with common software engineering tools and practices (Git, Unit Testing, CI)
â€¢ Some familiarity with design/UX principles
â€¢ Intrigued by the product as much as by technology
â€¢ Proficiency in Greek: the role involves regular interactions with Greek-speaking stakeholders, and a strong command of the Greek language is essential to ensure effective communication

We will appreciate it if you have
â€¢ Projects you've built/contributed to (e.g. Github account)
â€¢ Optimization of data usage over mobile networks
â€¢ Knowledge of Reactive/Functional programming
â€¢ Knowledge of SQLite
â€¢ Familiarity with agile methodologies and practices

Benefits

What's it like to work at Skroutz?
â€¢ A great opportunity to contribute to the evolution of Skroutz towards becoming one of Europe's fastest growing Marketplaces
â€¢ Thrive in an environment that champions ambitious goals, empowers autonomy, fosters mentoring, and unlocks exciting opportunities for both personal and business growth
â€¢ Competitive full-time salary
â€¢ Ongoing training and development
â€¢ Access to books, online courses, and relevant resources
â€¢ Top of the Line tools and equipment
â€¢ Private Medical Plan
â€¢ Hybrid Working
â€¢ Free gym membership at Golden Gym in Athens, plus OAKA cross training & running courses, Padel and online yoga
â€¢ For all New Skroutz Fathers we offer 30 working days paternity leave (1,5 months in total)
â€¢ Monthly childcare allowance for all Skroutz Parents
â€¢ Free Skroutz Plus subscription

As part of our dedication to the diversity of our workforce, Skroutz is committed to Equal Employment Opportunity without regard to race, color, national origin, ethnicity, gender, disability, sexual orientation, or religion.

Disclaimer:

Skroutz collects and processes personal data in accordance with the EU General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR). We are bound to use the information provided within your job application for recruitment purposes only and not to share these with any unauthorized third parties. Please read our Recruitment Privacy Policy here.

jobs_results.title: Mobile App Developer (Flutter)
jobs_results.description:
Sleed, a web development & digital marketing agency with many years of field experience and a strategic partner of Prestashop, NopCommerce & Google, is looking for a Mid-Level Mobile Application Developer to join our team at our Tech hub located ğŸ“at L. Athinon 100, Athens.

If you are passionate about building high-quality, cross-platform mobile applications with Flutter, and enjoy coding to create user-friendly software, weâ€™d love to meet you! While experience with native iOS and Android is welcome, itâ€™s not required; the primary focus for this role is expertise in Flutter development.

Primary Responsibilities
â€¢ Cross-Platform Development: Use Flutter to create responsive, high-performance applications that work seamlessly on both iOS and Android platforms.
â€¢ Technical Planning & Innovation: Collaborate with the project team to define the technical approach, contribute to implementation planning, and stay updated on emerging mobile development trends and technologies.
â€¢ User Interface Integration: Ensure the technical feasibility of UI/UX designs, and translate design prototypes into functional, user-centered applications.
â€¢ Performance Optimization: Optimize applications for maximum speed and responsiveness across devices, focusing on scalable and maintainable code.
â€¢ Team Collaboration & Support: Work closely with designers, other developers, and stakeholders to ensure smooth project execution, and implement efficiencies for repetitive or time-intensive tasks.
â€¢ Testing & Quality Assurance: Test and validate application functionality to ensure high quality and an excellent user experience.
â€¢ Core Skills:
â€¢ Proficiency in Flutter and Dart for cross-platform mobile application development (primary requirement)
â€¢ Familiarity with native iOS (Swift) and Android (Java/Kotlin) development is a plus but not required
â€¢ Experience with UI/UX design principles and translating designs into functional applications
â€¢ Familiarity with version control tools, preferably Git
â€¢ Additional Skills:
â€¢ Proficiency in prototyping tools, such as Adobe XD, to translate UI designs into application features
â€¢ Strong debugging and troubleshooting skills
â€¢ Soft Skills:
â€¢ Willingness to Learn: Open to feedback and proactive about personal growth
â€¢ Problem Solver: Ability to find practical solutions to user and technical challenges
â€¢ Time Management: Strong planning skills, able to prioritize tasks and meet deadlines
â€¢ Positive Mindset: Embraces new ideas and thrives in a collaborative environment
â€¢ Adaptability: Agile in a fast-paced, evolving project landscape

Effective communication and collaboration in Greek

Technologies We Use
â€¢ Mobile Development: Flutter for cross-platform development, with optional iOS (Swift) and Android (Java/Kotlin) knowledge
â€¢ Prototyping: Adobe XD for UI/UX design and wireframing
â€¢ Private health insurance
â€¢ Unlimited access to Udemy Business Platform (more than 17.000 top rated courses)
â€¢ Continuous training and education for all your learning and development needs
â€¢ Remote working 2-3 days per week #LI-Hybrid
â€¢ Alterlife Exclusive subscription deals
â€¢ Customer Discounts
â€¢ Competitive salary matching the candidateâ€™s skills and experience
â€¢ Career development opportunities
â€¢ Dog friendly space
â€¢ Sleed goody bag upon arrival
â€¢ All data will be handled with strict confidentiality and will be used for recruitment purposes only.

jobs_results.title: Lead Android Engineer
jobs_results.description:
Lead/Architect Android Engineer

We are looking for a Lead/Architect Android Engineer to join our innovative mobile development team. You will play a critical role in designing and developing high-quality Android applications, driving architectural decisions, and mentoring a talented team of developers. This is an exciting opportunity for a highly experienced professional passionate about Android development, eager to shape technical strategy, and lead impactful projects in a dynamic and forward-thinking environment.

Key Responsibilities:
â€¢ Android App Development: Architect, design, and develop cutting-edge Android applications using Kotlin and modern frameworks, including Jetpack Compose.
â€¢ Technical Leadership: Provide mentorship and technical guidance to the development team, conducting code reviews, and fostering a culture of continuous improvement.
â€¢ Feature Ownership: Lead the delivery of complex features and solutions, ensuring they meet business goals, technical standards, and user expectations.
â€¢ Solution Architecture: Define and implement scalable, maintainable, and secure application architectures, leveraging best practices in Android development.
â€¢ Collaboration: Partner with cross-functional teams, including product managers, designers, and back-end engineers, to deliver seamless and innovative solutions.
â€¢ UI/UX Expertise: Oversee the implementation of intuitive, high-performance user interfaces adhering to Material Design principles and modern UI patterns.
â€¢ Performance Optimization: Drive debugging, testing, and performance tuning efforts to ensure applications run smoothly across various devices and configurations.
â€¢ Continuous Innovation: Stay current with advancements in Android development, including Jetpack libraries and emerging technologies, and evaluate their potential for integration.
â€¢ Google Play Store Management: Guide app deployment processes, ensuring compliance with Google Play Store guidelines and a seamless release experience.

Qualifications:
â€¢ Experience: 6+ years of professional experience in Android development, with demonstrated expertise in Kotlin and a solid understanding of Java.
â€¢ Architectural Skills: Proven ability to design and implement scalable and maintainable Android application architectures.
â€¢ Jetpack Compose Expertise: Strong experience in building modern, responsive UI components using Jetpack Compose.
â€¢ UI/UX Proficiency: In-depth knowledge of Material Design principles and the ability to deliver polished, user-friendly interfaces.
â€¢ API Integration: Advanced experience with RESTful APIs, JSON, and third-party library integration.
â€¢ Version Control: Proficiency with Git and familiarity with CI/CD pipelines.
â€¢ Agile Development: Experience working in Agile environments with tools like Jira or Trello for project management.
â€¢ Problem-Solving Skills: Exceptional analytical skills with the ability to troubleshoot and optimize complex Android applications.

Elevate Your Experience The Perks of Joining Us:
â€¢ Competitive compensation package with performance-based bonuses.
â€¢ Comprehensive healthcare benefits and wellness programs.
â€¢ Structured career advancement plans and leadership development opportunities.
â€¢ Collaborative and inclusive culture, with a commitment to diversity and innovation.
â€¢ Opportunity to lead impactful projects and work on cutting-edge technology solutions.
